alert.note: Alert for Coastal Indian River; Coastal St. Lucie; Inland Indian River; Inland St. Lucie (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 13 at 5:05PM EST by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern St. Lucie and southeastern Indian River Counties through 545 PM EST... At 505 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pointe West, or near Vero Beach South, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fort Pierce, Vero Beach, Indian River Shores, Vero Beach South and Gifford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Indian River; Coastal St. Lucie; Inland Indian River; Inland St. Lucie
